unnormalised: Arre yaar, mhozo mama Rakesh, Gurgaon-cho, purnnponni fasso poddlo pattlea satolleant. Tannem Jio-chea falteg data-vixim ek WhatsApp forward-antli link click keli. Dusrem kitench na, tachem bank account khali kelem! Tannem sumar Rs. 50,000 gumaile! Cyber police-an taka sanglem ki tem ek phishing scam aslem ani heo vostu sodanch ghoddtat. Tannim mhonnlem ki tachea account-ar 2FA enable korunk zai aslem ani kednach vollkh naslilea link-ancher click korunk favonaslem. Atam to purnn stresse-ant asa ani sodanch mhunnta “kya zamana aa gaya hai!” To aiz FIR file kortolo, taka tache kaim poixe portun melltole mhunn umed kortam.
normalised: Arre yaar, mazo mama Rakesh, zo Gurgaon-cho, puro last week-ar scam zalo. Tannem Jio-koddlean fukat data mellttat mhonnun ek WhatsApp forward-antli link click keli. Magir thoddea velan taka koll’lle ki tacho bank account puro rikto zalo! Sumar rupiya pon’nas hazar loss zalo taka! Cyber police-amni tankam sanglo ki to phishing scam aslo ani oxem sodanch zata mhonnun. Te mhonntale ki tannem aplea account-ar two F-A (Two-Factor Authentication) enable korunk zai aslem ani kednach vollokh naslilya link-acher click korunk favo naslem. Atam to puro stress zalo asa ani sodanch mhonnta "kya zamana aa gaya hai!" To aiz F-I-R file kortolo, umed asa taka thode poixe porot mellttele mhonnun.
